name: Retention Ink
description:
Main

This game is about pen and a bug, you play as bug, trying to avoid the ink from pen. Pen appears every 10 seconds and draws a new line. Do not touch the ink, it damages you. Pens can clone over a certain amount of time, thoughout the game time.

Everything is happening at the single sheet of paper. Try also collecting power-ups, such as health boosts, jump and speed boosts. General idea is that you need to stay alive as long as you can, try getting the highest score possible

There's also a timed mode, where you have 10 seconds to collect bread crumbs as more as you able to...

Game was made for Ludum Dare 51 Credits:

Blayms - Coding, head developer

Zimachik - Art, SFX, Music, Ideas, secondary developer

Brodadi - Art, Ideas

VanderCool8 - Ideas

Controls:

Mouse to rotate

Space to use jump boost
